data: The organization Global Learning Initiative is an institution.
The organization Global Learning Initiative operates in the Education and Nonprofit industries.
The organization Global Learning Initiative is dedicated to expanding access to education worldwide.
The organization Global Learning Initiative empowers communities through open-source educational resources and teacher training.
The organization Global Learning Initiative values Equity, Collaboration, and Innovation.
The organization Global Learning Initiative is located in Geneva, Switzerland.
The organization Global Learning Initiative was founded in 2005.
The organization Global Learning Initiative has partnered with over 200 schools across 30 countries.
